entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ComInterfaceGenerator should generate a free of the local variable in the catch clause of unmanagedToManaged stubs, and free the old parameter value in the AssignOut stage #89483
  • Consider moving some bits of Emscripten property checks and setup to the WorkloadManifest package. #89482
  • StreamWriter might not call Flush #89480
  • [API Proposal]: Add CloseAsync to Stream #89479
  • [Analyzer]: Recommend usage of constant in `stackalloc` expressions #89478
  • Parallel.ForEachAsync with thread-local state just like Parallel.ForEach #89476
  • HasNativeCodeReJitAware #89475
    8.0.0
  • Have AreOptimizationsDisabled to go through DAC #89474
    8.0.0
  • chrome-DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests crashing in CI #89470
    8.0.0
  • [runtime-sanitized]: ASAN default options not being respected on NativeAOT smoke tests on Linux #89468
  • [libs][iOS] TimeZoneInfo StandardName/DisplayName display abbreviations instead of full name #89466
    8.0.0
  • Different marshaller structs should be used for unmarshalling and marshalling elements in UnmanagedToManaged stubs #89463
  • Track stateful marshallers for each element in unmanaged to managed stubs #89462
    Future
  • Warning when using a collection initializer with more elements than specified in the capacity #89461
  • JIT: Local morph GetElement/WithElement handling for Vector3 does not handle larger SIMD sources #89456
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Possible algorithm improvement for method lookup #89455
    Future
  • [WASM][Debugger]Test timed out: DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.CreateGoodBreakpoint #89453
  • Test failure: HttpMetricsTest_Http*.CurrentRequests_InstrumentEnabledAfterSending_NotRecorded #89451
    8.0.0
  • Managed Memory Leak on NET for ManagementClass #89450
  • Injected or scoped ServiceProvider does not support Keyed services #89447
  • Keyed services aren't working with HttpClientBuilder #89446
  • Fix SafeHandle usage in System.IO.Compression #89445
  • [Mono] Windows static library runtime build exports MONO_API functions. #89444
  • [Test Failure] Long Running Test: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_Sync.SendRecv_Stream_TCP_LargeMultiBufferSends #89440
  • Implement Generic support for `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` #89439
    Future
  • [nativeaot][maccat] Add Native AOT runtime tests coverage on maccatalyst platforms #89437
    9.0.0
  • [nativeaot][ios] DynamicGenerics tests failed on apple mobile platforms #89436
    8.0.0
  • Problem with GLIBC_2.34 on Ubuntu.22.04-x64 #89471
  • [mono][ios] MarshalingPInvokeScanner fails with PE image does not have metadata #89429
    8.0.0
  • A really obscure System.IO.Pipes issue that appeared on .NET 6 #89427
  • [browser] mono runtime already exited with 0 #89425
    8.0.0
  • The `FindPythonInterp` will be removed by cmake #89424
  • Empty `_.pdb` files are included in the artifacts produced by build of the runtime repo #89423
  • System.Xml.Serialization: Add ability to omit setting nullable IList types to new() #89420

Closed

  • [wasm] Improve the UX for using codespaces to run library tests, and debug #70122
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Cannot installs `wasm-tools` for Wasm.Build.Tests on macOS/arm64 #78626
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] v8 crashing at the end with "Reached heap limit" - for AOT builds #88497
    8.0.0
  • [browser][build][libraries] Properties are not propagated from nested build upwards #82819
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Ensure that proxy ports can be configured from command line, and make the parameters discoverable #70680
    8.0.0
  • [tracking] Publish .NET assemblies in Webcil files #80807
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] WasmTemplateTests for console failing due to truncated output #71887
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable wasm relinking for Trimming tests running in `dotnet-linker-tests` #49790
    8.0.0
  • Slow CPU-Intensive Calculations #45363
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Test the templates in VS and VS for Mac #64336
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM AOT .NET 6 performance degradation on Safari, iPhone 6, iOS 15.1 #61373
    8.0.0
  • `dotnet` exits with exit code `139` on linux, with a core file dumped #68393
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Publish Emscripten Deadlocked #68708
    8.0.0
  • Cross-gen failed to produce PDB for C# Dev Kit binaries #89337
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.Tests` - assertion - `src/mono/mono/metadata/object.c:926` #89398
    8.0.0
  • RyuJIT and SIMD - suboptimal codegen when performing bitmask comparisons #10560
    Future
  • ComInterfaceGenerator should warn when a collection's element marshaller is stateful #89465
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Implement support for UnsafeAccessorAttribute #86040
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Make runtime errors from simd and exception handling failures easy to understand #84574
    8.0.0
  • [mono][tvos] Failing Vector64/128 tests #87164
    8.0.0
  • X500DistinguishedName OID 2.5.4.97 issue on Windows #89434
  • Tracing GC on iOS yields mono_coop_cond_signal Cannot transition thread 0x2016c7280 from STATE_BLOCKING with DO_BLOCKING #88642
    8.0.0
  • fgVNBasedIntrinsicExpansionForCall_ReadUtf8 supports only ASCII #89375
    8.0.0
  • Codespaces prebuild often fails with msbuild "Child node "2" exited prematurely" #73774
    8.0.0
  • mono runtime using 3rd Party library internal invoke native code lead app crash #78205
    8.0.0
  • E2E scenario: ASP.NET minimal Web API applications can be NativeAOT compiled for size and performance #75621
    8.0.0
  • [mono] UnsafeAccessor to a virtual method on a base class through a derived type asserts #89212
    8.0.0
  • .NET Runtime missing prompt is not redirecting to the correct runtime URL #36765
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Support UnsafeAccessorAttribute method calls with custom modifiers #89098
    8.0.0
  • Host work in .NET 8 #77456
    8.0.0
  • Framework resolution should perform basic validation of frameworks #48180
    8.0.0
  • Ability to customize the runtime location for framework-dependent apps (apphost) #70975
    Future
  • .NET 8: Host improvements #71284
    8.0.0
  • Is it static link only of mono aot on windows? #79214
    9.0.0
  • [Mono-Arm64] Improved application throughput performance implementing hardware specific optimizations #70562
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Improvement: avoid deep recursion in mono_ssa_rename_vars #60266
    8.0.0
  • fill the mono_alc_get_ambient with right behavior #62099
    8.0.0
  • [MonoVM] Profiled AOT generates "empty" shared libraries #61415
    8.0.0
  • In mono arm64, when creating a delegate that returns 16byte-size-struct, the generated code is wrong #60282
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Exceptions not being thrown for certain misuses of threading primitives #34366
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.EnumConverterTests.NegativeEnumValue_CultureInvariance #86417
    8.0.0
  • Linux Release AllSubsets_Mono_LLVMFullAot_RuntimeTests llvmfullaot fails on CI #79255
    8.0.0
  • Blazor wasm aot is not ahead of time #89403
  • [MONO][Perf] Linux/x64: 151 Regressions on 9/30/2022 2:28:26 AM #76913
  • Native Runtime Repository Crash Issue #76938
  • [release/6.0] Doublelinklist GC failures on Mono #83245
  • [6.0] Some more doublinklist failures in mono minijit and llvmaot arm64 linux #83424
  • [CoreCLR] Implement support for `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` #86161
    8.0.0
  • Timeout running `System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.CustomConverterTests.GetConverter_Poco_WriteThrowsNotSupportedException` on mono interpreter #66371
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in IfStatements.IfStatements and Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.WriteJson<SimpleStructWithProperties> #80565
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Tests.Perf_Reader #82107
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Tests #83398
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.WriteJson<HashSet<String>> #83523
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 6/7/2023 7:43:49 PM #87639
    8.0.0
  • APPLICATION_HANG_cfffffff_coreclr.dll!Thread::DoAppropriateWaitWorker #89297
  • Regressions in FrozenDictionary #88202
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 34 Regressions on 9/9/2022 1:01:45 PM #75544
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CtorFromCollection<String> and System.Collections.CtorFromCollection<Int32> #88378
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Tests.Perf_PriorityQueue<String, String> #81553
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Refactor `System.Linq.Expressions` private feature switches #89171
    8.0.0
  • [browser][nodejs] RequestDuration_CustomTags_Recorded - ENOENT: no such file or directory, open 'http://127.0.0.1:45051/' #88900
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Update documentation when building native libraries with a custom native host #82156
    Future
  • All Vector<T> operators use software fallbacks when AVX is not presented #89408
    8.0.0
  • Cryptographic error "Padding is invalid and cannot be removed" #88070
  • System.Reflection on NET Self Contained app fails with TypeLoadException (net fx based assembly) #88496
  • superpmi: DeprecationWarning running superpmi.py #84710
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix opt-cross-module using non version safe tokens #89481
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Make a copy of 'clrjit' binary for use in SuperPMI collect to avoid heap errors when the same 'clrjit' binary is used #89473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] high level documentation of WASM features #89469
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Look for Native Signal SIMD Context #89467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove net7 nuget feeds #89460
    needs-area-label
  • Add CollectionBuilder attribute to some immutable collection interfaces #89459
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Avoid some rune iteration in GetEncodedTruncatedBytesFromString #89458
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix STJ source gen support for System.BinaryData. #89454
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [HTTP] Catch and ignore exception from an external server #89452
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Improve case-insensitive prefix extraction in Regex #89449
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix a couple of replay bugs #89443
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix for EventPipe ep_rt_temp_path_get off by 1 issue. #89438
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [browser] Clean-up typescript code imported from Blazor #89435
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Do not set -msimd128 in the default rsp #89433
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][llvm][jit] Adding support for Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits intrinsic on ARM64 with LLVM + refactoring miniJIT opcodes #89431
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] MarshalingPInvokeScanner tolerates DLLs without metadata #89430
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add explicit conversion of floating-point call args #89428
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] fix the compiling errors within the CLFS linux #89422
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #89421
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Relink for non-unicode tests should be running. #89419
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Setting RequiredMemberAttribute usage as inherited. #89418
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2229389 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json

Merged

  • Include TypeNameBuilder.cs from CoreLib instead of copying the file over #89144
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Delete an unused `Span` class from `object.h` #89464
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix failure to generate ngen pdb in crossgen #89415
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable gsharing when Unsafe.ReadUnaligned/WriteUnaligned () i… #89417
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Address unused suppressions #89216
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] detect SIMD and EH support #89387
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Allow multiple kmask registers to be allocated and cleanup some codegen around them #89059
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] only trace ExitStatus stack trace if `diagnosticTracing` is true #89432
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Filter list of candidate invocations for parsing in binding generator #89266
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Remove nullable return from ConstructorInvoker.Invoke() #89448
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Support non-ascii in fgVNBasedIntrinsicExpansionForCall_ReadUtf8 #89383
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run Antigen/Fuzzlyn on Saturdays too #89426
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Get the normal event accessors generated #89441
    linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Fixes for outerloop-mono.yml #88743
    area-Build-mono
  • [Mono] UnsafeAccessor: Support ambiguous method match #89217
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Disable failing Utf8JsonWriter test. #89442
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Enable Mono for using faster invoke stubs #89108
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] WBT fixes, and rationalization to allow improved testing #89360
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding test for #80049 #89399
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • FIX #87983 - Enable events for LogAlways #89326
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix System.BinaryData tests failing in AOT. #89381
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Refactor System.Linq.Expressions feature switches #89308
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] fix NodeJS fetch detection #89393
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Make PackedSimd.Shuffle internal #89401
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Bump timeout in runtime-extra-platforms-ioslike.yml #89400
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Delete NativeAOT_StaticInitialization #89291
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove InstructionSet_VectorT256 if AVX2 is disabled via env var #89413
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make textual stack trace metadata smaller #89377
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixed python warning: DeprecationWarning: There is no current event loop #89404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Gen0 Budget counter #89412
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Set the CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE_SAMETRY on CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE #88072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Check for dotnet.dll when enumerating SDK paths #89333
    area-Host
  • Dynamic events #89371
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ownership tracking #89329
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [IGNORE][wasm] CI for running wbt with multithreaded runtime #87895
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Flush the gclog after GC #88222
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Generates a guid for activity id #88838
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Use [UnmanagedCallersOnly] in GetDelegateForFunctionPoin… #89334
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [browser][mt] enable more GC code #88735
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Fix Vector512 rightshift #89339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Enable configuration FunctionalTests.ArrayTests.DifferentConfigSources_Merged_* tests on ios/tvos #89319
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • SBLK_MASK_LOCK_THREADID allow tid up to 65535 (#88772) #89335
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Fix TraceSwitch to synchronize the Value and Level properties #89278
    area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource, 8.0.0
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter multithreading support #88279
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove Crossgen2's -O option in Test Builds Wherever Possible #89223
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][ios] Improve Native AOT test coverage on apple mobile platforms #89301
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [iOS][MacOS] Run tests on iOS 17 and MacOS 14 scouting queues #88479
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable IOPack, IOEnqueue, and IODequeue on Windows #88894
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #89388
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasm-aot-test, 7.0.x
  • Add `CompressSymbols` opt-out option in NativeAOT #85192
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove --flat from default dsymutil options #89358
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip during AOT compilation of library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Implement RandomAccess.FlushToDisk() #89100
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement missing cases for GlobalizationNative_GetLocaleInfoString #89296
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • handle QUIC_STATUS_ADDRESS_NOT_AVAILABLE #89362
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Avoid boxing in Enum.HasFlag in Tier0 #89348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Integrate DevServer into WasmAppHost #88985
    arch-wasm, area-Host, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` calendar data #89255
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Fix `LocalBuilder.IsPinned` always returning `false` on CoreCLR runtime #89411
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT createdump fork/exec for crash dump generation #89203
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add BinaryData.ContentType #87744
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: c++ static class ctor initialization workarounds #2359

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix build error in Mzlib benchmarks #2361
  • Fixed build ManagedZLib #2360
  • Mzlib benchmarks #2358

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 8.0 SDK contains many assemblies with 6.0/7.0 assembly versions #34245

Closed

  • Configuration binder source generator enabled in Blazor WASM #34135
  • Native AOT doesn't work with Windows Forms #34129

PullRequests

Created

  • [draft] Containers: implementation of OAuth2 #34237
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #31581
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • [main] Disable ConfigurationBinder source generator in Blazor WASM #34220
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Remove unused usings #34225
    untriaged
  • Revert "#30336 Default Dotnet Tool to Run on Latest Runtime - Build time change" #34132
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Containers: Protocol correctness and quirk handling for Basic and Bearer authentication for registries #33753
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Fix package verification for some valid packages on windows #34144
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.22
  • Configurable wwwroot for StaticWebAssets #34178
    Area-AspNetCore, 8.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • Proposed change to method group natural type #7364
  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Champion: fixed-sized buffers #1314
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #7380

Merged

  • Collection expressions: updates for builder methods #7370

Updated

  • Define capture behavior when primary ctor bypassed #7354

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generic constraints should prune out candidates for method group natural type #69222
    17.8
  • EnC: Renaming a property with initializer doesn't work as expected #69216
  • Only Left and returnValue gets checked for dynamic in signature #69215
  • Scoped keyword emitted by SyntaxGenerator for out parameters #69213
  • EndToEndTests.LongInitializers often times out on linux #69210
    17.8
  • It looks like ```RetargetedExplicitImplementationComparer``` uses wrong mode to compare ref kinds. #69208
  • XML documentation ignored when generated by an external tool #69204
  • Better documentation for SourceReferenceResolver #69201
  • EnC: Changing signature of an async method or an iterator does not work #69199

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33925.355 #69223
  • [Proposal]: breaking point for C# Primary Constructor #67796
  • IDE0200 is too aggressive #69209

PullRequests

Created

  • Check only once if csc.exe as filename #69221
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Only use scoped for ref parameters #69220
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • WIP: not ready for review. #69219
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only Left and returnValue gets checked for dynamic in signature #69214
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Ensure proper definite assignment analysis for an inline array that is not supported by language. #69212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Collection expressions: rename files #69207
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP #69206
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix `ref readonly` mismatch retargeting #69205
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters

Merged

  • Source generators/track values etw #68830
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Skip LongInitializerList on Linux for now #69211
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Don't compare item2 with itself but with item1 #69217
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Localize C# Interactive window title #69066
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary calls to `Contains` for sets #69179
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Disable local deploy of the arm64 ServiceHub project #69200
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use variable group for apiscan #69191
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove newly documented rules from list #69145
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update PublishData.json for 17.8 P1 snap #69198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69224
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Require `SizeConst` for `UnmanagedType.ByValArray` #68992
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Find compatible substituted implicit extensions #68989
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Another way to correct generate Uri for new Document when resolve code action #68995
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update cancellation token handling behavior for certain analyzer APIs #69108
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Results of using 'use collection expressions' #69189
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Initial support for a set of analyzers/fixers to update existing code to use collection expressions. #69118
    Area-Analyzers, Story, untriaged
  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 7.2.1.6856 (#67875) #69065
  • Relax method conversions with ref readonly parameters #69020
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Use consistent failure mode for inline arrays that have unsupported element fields due to different reasons. #69190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Allow parsing `ref readonly` parameters in `cref` #69104
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Update Concord dependency versions and fix nullability warnings #69195
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add more `ref readonly` tests and address comments #69183
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Remove mocks of setting services for unit tests #69160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged

Issues

  • DPAPI and Antiforgery failture in Razor Pages #49525
  • BUG ROLES IN RAZOR PAGE (Blazor) #49590

  • Add ability to generate PIN instead of long tokens when trying to generate confirm email token or change password token. #49607

PullRequests

  • Add a .http file to WebAPI project template #49561
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Grid contents and layout are messed up by Picker changes #16354
  • Implement support for custom page transition animation not Shell for Android #16353
  • [iOS] When using a ScrollView with Shell the ContentSize isn't sizing consistently with Forms #16352
  • SwipeView breaks binding #16345
  • Multi line editor height issue in .NET MAUI Editor control #16341
  • Grid with a star and an empty auto column leads to an incorrect layout #16334
  • "selected execution mode is not supported for .NET projects." #16333

Closed

  • BlazorWebView&WebView Unable to load on the windows11 system, the program crashes directly #16161
  • FlyoutIcon does not work on Windows, although it works on Android #7577
    .NET 8 GA
  • "LoadFromXaml" inherited from a component does not find the converters used in a ControlTemplate located in another assembly. #16337
  • Bind a decimal value to Entry without StringFormat alters my binded value. #10840
    Backlog
  • Layout failure - children overflowing their bounding boxes in 7.0.86 #15195
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppRecipesSearch_Searchbymealtypesection_Orientation: At landscape orientation "Click here to view full recipe" and "Add to my recipes" controls are not visible. #15229
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_ScreenReader: Talkback is not announcing "Recipe Name" field as required field and not marked up with any chevron/symbol. #15625
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_NonTextContrast: Disabled "Save" button is not looking like disabled. #15626
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesEdit_EditRecipe_Screen Reader: Talkback focus is not moving correctly when we try to edit in "Ingredients" and "Recipe". #15226
    .NET 8 GA
  • Custom webviewhandler keeps getting event of DisconnectHandler in a continuous loop #16198

PullRequests

Created

  • Dev/update templates for blazor #16355
  • [appium] Bump appium version #16351

Merged

    t/housekeeping ♻︎

  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Fix issue with ListView not firing SelectedItemChanged #16275

Updated
